See also: sekunde, sekundē, and sekundė

German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • Secunde

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [zeˈkʊndə]
  • audio (Germany)
    		(file)
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Sekunde f (genitive Sekunde, plural Sekunden)

  1. A unit of time; a second.
  2. A unit of angular measurement; a second.
  3. (music) An interval of 1 (kleine Sekunde) or 2 (große Sekunde) halftones.
